reserved.description:
Reserved volume size. Visible only if you set the ``usage=True``
query parameter.

in_use.description:
The in use data size. Visible only if you set the ``usage=True``
query parameter.

gigabytes.description: The number of gigabytes allowed for each tenant.

snapshots.description: The number of snapshots allowed for each tenant.

volumes.description: The number of volumes allowed for each tenant.
